item.title: Using R and Vim together
item.description: Turn Vim into an R IDE Since a while i use vim and R together and i am very happy with that solution. In this post i just want tell how it works. What is an IDE IDE is the abbreviation for “integrated development environment”. Simply spoken it is a working environment to solve coding tasks. A full explanation gives for example Wikipedia. Why i do not use R Studio? Hmmm, well i started to use vim and have gotten used to it.
